1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators on relational lattice.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice.Rop
6  ( ropsLattice,
7  ) where
8
9import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                   as O
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                       as C
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base                   as Rop
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice.Restrict  as Rop
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice.Tropashko as Rop
14
15
16-- | Lattice implementations of relmap operators.
17--
18--   [@join@]    Join two relations.
19--
20--   [@meet@]    Meet two relations.
21--
22--   [@none@]    Restriction by relmaps.
23--
24--   [@some@]    Restriction by relmaps.
25--
26--   [@sub@]     Restriction to subrelation.
27--
28ropsLattice :: (Ord c) => [C.Rop c]
29ropsLattice = Rop.ropList "lattice"  -- GROUP
30    --        CONSTRUCTOR         USAGE                              ATTRIBUTE
31    [ Rop.rop Rop.consCompose   [ "compose R [-share /P ...]"    O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
32    , Rop.rop Rop.consJoin      [ "join R [-share /P ...]"       O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
33    , Rop.rop Rop.consMeet      [ "meet R [-share /P ...]"       O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
34    , Rop.rop Rop.consNone      [ "none R"                       O.& "-relmap/" ]
35    , Rop.rop Rop.consNoneMeet  [ "none-meet R [-share /P ...]"  O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
36    , Rop.rop Rop.consSome      [ "some R"                       O.& "-relmap/" ]
37    , Rop.rop Rop.consSomeMeet  [ "some-meet R [-share /P ...]"  O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
38    , Rop.rop Rop.consSub       [ "sub R [-share /P ...]"        O.& "-relmap/ . -share?" ]
39    ]
40
